summary: An author works on a project on the subject of love, and, in the process, crosses paths with a former love in his life.
cast: Bruno Putzulu|Cécile Camp|Jean Davy|Françoise Verny|Audrey Klebaner|Jérémie Lippmann|Claude Baignières|Rémo Forlani|Mark Hunter|Jean Lacouture|Philippe Lyrette|Bruno Mesrine|Djéloul Beghoura|Violeta Ferrer|Valérie Ortlieb|Serge Spira|Stéphanie Jaubert|Jean-Henri Roger|Lemmy Constantine|William Doherty|Hocine Choutri|Marie-Françoise Audollent|Ludovic Berthillot|Laurence Colussi|Marceline Loridan Ivens|François Rabinovici|Noël Simsolo|Ysé Tran|Marie Desgranges
title: Elogio del amor
